```{r}
set.seed(2022)
X1 <- runif(30, 0, 1)
X2 <- rnorm(30, 0, 0.2)

X <- cbind(X1, X2)
temp_y <- sqrt(X1) + (X2^2) + rnorm(length(X1), 0, 0.001)
y <- ifelse(temp_y < mean(temp_y), 0, 1)
```

```{r}
head(X, 5)
```

```{r}
y 
```

$y \sim X\beta + \epsilon$

```{r, fig.width=8, fig.height=8}
plot(X, main='allow good things to happen everywhere people go and make humans goread', cex.main=1)
```
